StringTable.Creator: Mesh Terrain Creator
StringTable.Name: Name
StringTable.UseObjNameWhenEmpty: the object's name will be use when not specified
StringTable.RaiseLower_Description: Click to raise/lower. Use space to toggle up/down.
StringTable.PaintHeight_Description: Hold ctrl to sample height, then click to paint.
StringTable.PaintControl_Description: Select a texture below, then click to paint.
StringTable.Info_PaintControl_NoSplatTextureFound: No splat textures found in targets.
StringTable.Info_ControlTextureWillBeSavedInstantly: Modification of the control texture will be saved instantly.
StringTable.PaintVertexColor_Description: Select a color, then click to paint.
StringTable.Info_ToolDescription_VertexColorFill: Fill all targets with the selected color.
StringTable.Info_ToolDescription_AttachVertexColor: Attach vertex color component to selected GameObject.
StringTable.Info_VertexColorWillBeSavedInstantly: Modification of the vertex color will be saved instantly.
StringTable.MeshMisc_Description: Click to select vertices. Hold shift to unselect. Press Enter to begin moving. Press Esc to reselect.
StringTable.Info_ToolDescription_DeleteVertices: Delete selected vertices (faces contains these vertices will be removed). Note vertex-colored GameObjects will be ignored.
StringTable.Warning_CannotCutHolesOnAVertexColoredMe: You cannot cut holes on a vertex-colored mesh-terrain.
StringTable.MeshToTerrainConverter_Description: Convert a mesh-terrain to a Unity3D terrain.
StringTable.UVEditor_Description: Normalize uv of a mesh; Invert u or v of a mesh
StringTable.PivotEditor_Description: Offset the pivot point of a mesh.
StringTable.MeshZUpToYUpConverter_Description: Convert a z-up mesh to y-up by rotating -90 degrees around x axis.
StringTable.MeshSaver_Description: Save a single mesh into an obj or asset file.
StringTable.Info_UseTheSaveButtonToSaveMesh: You must save the mesh terrain by clicking the Save button below! Ctrl+S WON'T work!
StringTable.Info_PleaseSelectAGameObjectWithVaildMes: Please select a GameObject with a valid mesh.
StringTable.Info_PleaseSelectAGameObjectWithTerrain: Please select a GameObject with a valid Terrain.
StringTable.Info_LimitOfTexture5: When using MTE/XXXX/5 Textures/XXXX/Fog, the layer5 shares Tilling and Offset with the layer4.
StringTable.Info_HotkeyTable:
Hotkey Table
F1 Height Tool: raise/lower F2 Height Tool: paint height F3 Height Tool: smooth height F4 Texture Painter F5 Vertex Color Painter F6 Mesh Toolbox F7 Settings
- + Adjust brush size. [ ] Adjust brush speed/strength/flow.
PageUp Undo (Fn+Up on Mac) PageDown Redo (Fn+Down on Mac)
~ Toggle selection wireframe.
* Hotkey is only available when 1. The IME is off. 2. The editor or scene view has the focus.
StringTable.Info_FreeVersion_MeshToolboxIsAProFeatur: Mesh toolbox is a pro-only feature.
StringTable.Info_FreeVersion_UsingSplatTexturesExcep: Using splat textures except 4 is a pro-only feature. Please remove or add the textures so the texture count is 4.
StringTable.About_CopyInfo: MTE is made by Zou Wei(zwcloud). Your current version is {0}
StringTable.Warning_ConfirmReplaceControlTexture: Are you sure you want to replace the control texture?
StringTable.Warning_ConfirmAttachVertexColorComponen: Are you sure you want to attach a vertex color component?
StringTable.Warning_MeshIsNotSaved:
Do you want to save the changes you made on the mesh-terrain?
You can save it later but your changes will be lost if you close Unity3D without saving it.
StringTable.Warning_PleaseSelectAPathInsideAssets: Please select a path inside the "Assets" directory
StringTable.Warning_TextureCountNotSupported: The terrain object has a different number of splat textures other than 2/3/4/5. Please remove or add the textures so the texture count is 2/3/4/5.
StringTable.Error_ShaderNotSupported: Current shader is not supported on target platform!
StringTable.Info_InvoiceNumberHint: The invoice number can be found in two places. 1. the attached PDF file of the purchase confirmation email from Unity asset store. 2. Open https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/#!/account/transactions, Find *Mesh Terrain Editor Pro*, the invoice number is in the *Description* column.
StringTable.ActivateHint: Activate MTE Pro using the invoice/serial number. (require Internet access)
StringTable.DeactivateHint: Deactive MTE Pro on this machine, you can then reactive it on another machine. MTE will revert to MTE Free on this machine. (require Internet access)
StringTable.ManualActivateHint: Activate MTE Pro manually for machines without direct access to the Internet.
StringTable.Error_AccessServerFailed: Something went wrong when trying to access the server. Please check your Internet access and try again later. Error: {0}
StringTable.Warning_ActivateFailed: The invoice/serial is not vaild or it doesn't match this computer. Please check your invoice/serial and try again.
StringTable.Info_ActivationHelp: If you need help for activation, please contact zwcloud@hotmail.com with your invoice number.
StringTable.ManualActivationHint1: Make sure your invoice/serial is valid. Then open the URL below in your webbrowser on a machine that has access to the Internet. You will get an activation code. The URL is already copied. Just Ctrl+V to paste it somewhere.
